title: The Dream Eaters and Other Stories
description: The dragons have been at war with the wyverns for as long as they can remember. With a spate of nightmares tormenting them and a sudden increase in wyvern attacks, the balance is tipping in their enemies’ favour. It falls to young albino Kalakri, the only dragon immune to the bad dreams, to investigate and try to save her colony.Also included in this collection are nine short stories that will take you from prehistory to the far future, from an English woodland to realms of myth and legend, all by Louise Searl, author of Kona’s Song and The Way of Kings.
author: Louise Searl
